mapper.select: SELECT b.basketno, b.amount, b.memberno, b.optionno, o.sizes, o.amount AS option_amount, o.color, s.shoesno, s.title, s.brand, s.rating, s.price, s.discount, s.contents FROM basket b JOIN options o ON b.optionno = o.optionno JOIN shoes s ON o.shoesno = s.shoesno WHERE b.memberno = ${memberno}
